attributes.action: Keep Ashford Eurostar services to Brussels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Later this year Eurostar intend to stop the services to Brussels from Ashford and transfer to Ebbsfleet(and also reduce Paris services). 
In view of:
- the millions of pounds of public money spent on Eurostar and Eurostar infrastructure
- the environmental impact on getting to Ebbsfleet (they boast of 9000 car spaces!)
- the damage to the environment
- the economic impact on South Kent and the government plans for expansion in SE England (housing, etc)
- the move from air travel to rail
- the general inconvenience for South Kent residents
- that no other European country would dream of cutting a major rail service

We ask the Prime Minister and the government to persuade the Eurostar management to reverse this backward and economically and environmentally harmful decision

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Ashford-Brussels/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
